title: Computer-Based Language Learning Design and Development Course for Adult Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and elementary-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Aims to improve practical language skills applicable to work as an in-service professional, conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can communicate effectively by appropriately utilizing 50 intermediate-level language expressions required in workplace situations.
Learners can engage in peer feedback-based project collaboration with fellow learners via LMS interactive tools at over 80% participation rate.
Learners can form self-directed learning habits of over five hours per week using mobile-optimized digital learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
